mapper.select: select * from `swc_board_file` join `swc_user` on swc_board_file.userNo = swc_user.userNo WHERE `bf_delflag` = 'n' order by swc_board_file.regDatetime desc;
select * from swc_noticefiledata join `swc_user` on swc_noticefiledata.userNo = swc_user.userNo where bf_pk=#{bf_pk} and `swc_noticefiledata`.attrib not like 'XXX%' order by uploadDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into swc_noticefiledata ( fileId, fileName, fileDesc, uploadDate, fileContent, fileExtention, fileSize, bf_pk, userNo, regDatetime, attrib ) values ( #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileDesc}, now(), #{fileContent}, #{fileExtention}, #{fileSize}, #{bf_pk}, #{userNo}, now(), 10000 )
mapper.delete: delete from swc_noticefiledata where fileId = #{fileId} and bf_pk=#{bf_pk}
